page.title: 11THE ENVIRONMENT OF GARFORTH
page.content: Garforth has most of the things a community needs like doctors, dentists, shops and entertainment. People who work out of Garforth can get into work quickly because it is situated on a good transport network which puts many towns and cities within easy reach. More things are needed to entertain teenagers and stop vandalism. There are several schools for 5-l8 year olds and the countrysideis within easy walking distance. Garforth has playing fields including cricket, football and rugby clubs also. The disadvantage of Garforth is that it does not have a swimming pool or a B.M.X. course both of which most young people would enjoy.
